name: Duotone Lab
description:
Duotone labs is an 8-bit style platformer where you're a test subject used by a facility called NERF going through a series of rooms, and your objective is to reach the exit to each room equipped with a special sidearm. They are always watching your progress. The rooms are designed to be dangerous, with different monsters blocking your path and deadly spikes covering your road to freedom... But no worries! You'll have a follower who will keep you company at all times! She even looks similar to you, I'm sure you'll get along together just fine ;)
Begin the experiments!
